font-size: 14px; font-family: Verdana;

p.span: The Spring Play, Elementary Spring Concert, and High School Concert are still on as scheduled, but are being monitored at this time due to projected crowd size and Minnesota Department of Health Guidelines. They are still a ways in the future, so things will hopefully improve before then.

span.style: font-size: 14px; font-family: Verdana;

p.span: The 6th Grade class trip is still on as scheduled due to the fact that it is still a couple of months away, but we will continue to monitor it at this time. Current MDH Guidelines do not recommend taking students to an infected area; however, hopefully, things will improve by then.

span.style: font-size: 14px; font-family: Verdana;

p.span: The winter sports banquet will be scheduled later this spring due to guidelines by the Minnesota Department of Health on event size and spacing.

span.style: font-size: 14px; font-family: Verdana;
font-size: 14px; font-family: Verdana;

div.span: Website by SchoolMessenger Presence. © 2020 Intrado Corporation. All rights reserved.
